org.littleshoot.proxy

Class KeepAliveTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.littleshoot.proxy.KeepAliveTest

  • public class KeepAliveTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This class tests the proxy's keep alive/connection closure behavior.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeepAliveTest() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setUp() 
      void tearDown() 
      void testBadGatewayDoesNotCloseConnection()
      Tests that the proxy does not close the connection after a 502 Bad Gateway response.
      void testGatewayTimeoutDoesNotCloseConnection()
      Tests that the proxy does not close the connection after a 504 Gateway Timeout response.
      void testHttp11DoesNotCloseConnectionByDefault()
      Tests that the proxy does not close the connection after a successful HTTP 1.1 GET request and response.
      void testProxyKeepsClientConnectionOpenAfterServerDisconnect()
      Tests that the proxy keeps the connection to the client open after a server disconnect, even when the server is using connection closure to indicate the end of a message.
      void testShortCircuitResponseCanCloseConnection()
      Tests that the proxy will close the connection after a short circuit response if the short circuit response contains a Connection: close header.
      void testShortCircuitResponseDoesNotCloseConnectionByDefault()
      Tests that the proxy does not close the connection by default after a short-circuit response.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
